pr_title: Fix inline schema in allOf without object type

timeline.message: fix inline schema without object type

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe we should log something here?
Have you tested with an object without type or properties defined (additionalProperties only)?
timeline.author: jimschubert

replies.bodyText: I tried to log something here - it's just a reference to a model. (e.g. Foo), which means it's not an inline schema.
replies.author: wing328

replies.bodyText:
Have you tested with an object without type

Yes of course. Let me add a test case tomorrow so that we'll be alerted in case the behavior has changed.
replies.author: wing328

replies.bodyText: Will add test cases in a separate PR.
replies.author: wing328
